document_data.mainbody:
uexohn was an incubus agent of the demon lord Grazzt in Hillsfar in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Ruexohn killed and replaced Davon Malaeda, the closest advisor of First Lord Torin Nomerthal. Using his new identity, Ruexohn influenced the First Lords decisions. He also introduced Nomerthal to his "twin sister" Thessaly Malaeda, just arrived in the cityâ€”a succubus and fellow agent of Grazzt.
Thessaly seduced Nomerthal and Ruexohn convinced him that he needed to marry her. So the First Lord organized the Midsummer Masquerade ball in order to announce his marriage to all the wealthiest citizens of Hillsfar. 
However, Ruexohn was quickly replaced by another incubus also posing as Davon.
